channel.title: About on BlitzLiving | Notes by Halim
channel.description: Recent content in About on BlitzLiving | Notes by Halim

item.description: Hey There I am Halim, a CS graduate turned PM, I love brainstorming new ideas, bringing people together and getting stuff done. I have a strong interest in system design, cryptocurrencies, Decentralization and the future of humanity. I got interested in Product Management after attending a Google Develper Conference in India in Nov 2016 where I saw various Google PMs launching new features and talking about their projects on stage.
